item.title: ‘Untamed’ Review: Eric Bana and Lily Santiago Anchor Netflix’s Intriguing but Rushed Yosemite-Set Mystery
item.description: Co-created by ‘American Primeval’ scribe Mark L. Smith, this six-episode thriller traces a murder investigation in the famous national park.
